page.title: 02Hobbies
page.content:
FLEEIN ABOUT ON THE KARTAE. The first thing yee dee is take the kartae oot o the shed and push it up the brae. It's fine in cumfie cause its got a seat and it's difficult tee cowp it because o the suspension in the front o it. Yee come fleein down and in tee the layby at the bottom which is covered wee sand and you flee in and jam on the brakes.
The first thing you do is take the kartae out of the shed and push it up the hill. It's fine and comfortable because it's got a seat and it's difficult to over turn it because of the suspension in the front of it. You come speeding down and in to the layby at the bottom and it's covered with sand and you speed in and put on the brakes.
